description: Get news articles relevant for a given query.
name: web_search_newssearch

improvement: Based on the feedback, it's clear that the current tool is not competitive with other tools. The most common query type was for 'latest' or 'breaking' news, so I'll focus on making this tool more appealing to those queries. I'll also add some language and country restrictions to make it more specific and relevant.
description: Get breaking news headlines in real-time for a given topic, country, and language. This endpoint is ideal for applications that require up-to-the-minute information on various subjects. With support for multiple languages and countries, you can easily customize your news feed to suit your needs.
name: web_search_newssearch_breaking

improvement: Based on the feedback, it's clear that the current tool is competitive with other tools when it comes to getting breaking news in real-time. However, there are opportunities to improve by making the tool more appealing to users who want specific topics or categories of news. I'll focus on adding more descriptive language and emphasizing the tool's ability to provide up-to-the-minute information.
description: Get instant access to breaking news headlines for any topic, country, or language. With our real-time news feed, you can stay ahead of the curve with the latest developments in politics, business, technology, entertainment, and more. Whether you're looking for news from a specific region or on a particular topic, we've got you covered.
